name: Bonsly

evolution.description: Bonsly can evolve into Sudowoodo at the time 'Mimic' is learned. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Bonsai Pokémon. It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no recoil damage.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
